daily_fact: New York City's vibrant culture is celebrated in the "Cartoon Bromance Edition" of Streetsblog, showcasing the city's unique charm and creativity through engaging illustrations and stories.
topline_md: New York faces a trio of health concerns with a new flu mutation, while Mayor-elect Mamdani prepares for a swift transition to City Hall, addressing issues like NYPD surveillance and affordable housing amidst rising political challenges and community advocacy.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Experts warn of trio of illnesses and a new flu mutation affecting New York residents. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Thanksgiving weather forecast indicates potential travel disruptions; check conditions before heading out. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Asian dessert buns recalled from stores across New York due to safety concerns. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

civics_politics.title: Civics & Politics
civics_politics.summary_md:
### Civics & Politics

- Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani appoints over 400 transition team members to prepare for City Hall. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Mamdani pledges to review NYPD's surveillance practices in immigration courts, calling them "deeply troubling." [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiiwFBVV95cUxOUzBtaThSdFRjMU5kSlN1Xzk1MW5NODQtT0dOSGR3eWp1amdNT1RDbUVRX1Jvb0dXd3NqMVJwOERNVFFfMXlPOGdZRGNGd1BaOFR5Y2JCZjgteTNYZEI2N2lSUFkyazZLbHJJdGhFbi1IOG96MkstTEtLOUpscE9CdWRta1Z5Njl1RGs0?oc=5)

opportunities_welfare.title: Opportunities & Welfare
